homepage.heroSubtitle: Commitment, experience, and dedication to protect your rights and interests.

aboutpage.title: Commitment to Justice and Excellence
aboutpage.intro: Érika Lizeth Morales Andrade: Born in Quito, Ecuador. Law graduate from the renowned Complutense University of Madrid, with a Master’s Degree in Access to the Legal Profession from the prestigious Francisco de Vitoria University. Member of the Culture and Training Commission of the Illustrious Bar Association of Málaga, Fuengirola Delegation. She has served as an attorney at the Housing Office of the Navalcarnero City Council in the Community of Madrid, as well as a collaborating lawyer for a major national law firm in the banking law sector.
aboutpage.philosophyText: I believe in practicing law based on trust, transparency, and constant communication. Every case is unique and deserves meticulous attention. I am committed to guiding you through each step of the legal process, clearly explaining your options so you can make informed decisions.
aboutpage.experienceText: With a solid background in various areas of law, I have represented clients in complex negotiations and demanding litigation. My dedication is to ensure the best possible outcome for you, your family, or your business.

servicespage.title: Practice Areas
servicespage.subtitle: I offer expert legal representation across a wide range of disciplines for individuals and businesses.
servicespage.civilText: Defense and representation in cases involving contracts, debt claims, civil liability, leases, and property matters.
servicespage.familyText: Advice on divorce proceedings, child custody, alimony, inheritance, and estate planning.
servicespage.penalText: Legal assistance and defense throughout all stages of criminal proceedings, from arrest to trial, for all types of offenses.
servicespage.immigrationText: Processing of residence permits, nationality applications, family reunifications, and appeals against denials.

contactpage.title: Contact
contactpage.subtitle: I’m here to help. Send your inquiry through the form or use the direct contact details. The first consultation is confidential.
contactpage.infoAddress: Calle Antequera 2, 2nd floor, 29649, Fuengirola, Málaga, Spain

introQuote.title: Multidisciplinary Law Firm
introQuote.quote: Law consists of three basic principles: to live honestly, to harm no one, and to give each their due. It is the art of the good and the equitable.
introQuote.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero (106 BC – 43 BC)

officeInfo.title: Our Law Firm
officeInfo.p1: We are a growing multidisciplinary law firm, specialized in immigration law and dedicated to administrative, civil, criminal, labor, and social security law. Our goal is to provide a comprehensive and personalized service, tailored to each client’s needs. We advise and manage all types of legal procedures, as well as applications for grants and subsidies, always ensuring a close, professional, and efficient approach.

officeInfo2.title: Trusted Collaborators and Partners
officeInfo2.p2: At our main office in Fuengirola, we collaborate with the accounting firm Pérez y Porras and with the notary office of Pablo Pol Seijas, both fully trusted partners. We also work with several insurance brokerages across Spain, such as Fuengirola Brokers, among others.

officeInfo3.title: Multilingual Service for Our Clients
officeInfo3.p3: We offer translation services in English, French, and many other languages, providing linguistic support for both official documents and communications with clients or international partners.
